reuters.title: BECOR <BCW> TO ADJOURN DELAYED HOLDERS MEETING
reuters.body: Becor Western Inc said no business will be transacted at the shareholders meeting scheduled for 1000 CDT tomorrow and the meeting will be permanently adjourned. If a definitive agreement or transaction results from any of the offers now pending for the company's stock, Becor said, a date for a new shareholders meeting will be established. Reuter 
